quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years
Grow old with me, the best is yet to be.
For you see, each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
I want you for always â€¦ days, years, eternities.
There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
Real love stories never have endings.
Love seems the swiftest, but it is the slowest of all growths. No man or woman really knows what perfect love is until they have been married a quarter of a century.
May the love that you share last your lifetime, A blessing hand always be there, May success and happiness be yours forever As you make a wonderful pair!
You were made perfectly to be loved - and surely I have loved you, in the idea of you, my whole life long.
Love is the emblem of eternity, it confounds all notion of time, effaces all memory of a beginning, all fear of an end
I wouldn't change a thing, as happiness you bring. You are my soulmate. A marriage made by fate.
I never loved you any more than I do, right this second. And I'll never love you any less than I do, right this second.
A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
The sum which two married people owe to one another defies calculation. It is an infinite debt, which can only be discharged through eternity.
It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
There is no mystery â€” that's the beauty of it. We are entirely explicable to each other, and yet we stay. What a miracle that is.

As we begin a new chapter in our lives, remember one thing: My heart is forever yours, and I will cherish every passing second I have you in my life. Keep my heart for I will always be deeply in love with you.
Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.
The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
As we grow older together, As we continue to change with age, There is one thing that will never change. . . I will always keep falling in love with you.
If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk in my garden forever
I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there's a life after that, I'll love you then.
Forever is a measure of time used by people who share an ordinary love. Our extraordinary love is immeasurable ... for us, forever just won't do.
If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
Like good wine, marriage gets better with age â€” once you learn to keep a cork in it
Not only have I seen truth in your eyes, you remind me of time itself for you are my Past, Present, Future, and Forever. I love you. Happy Anniversary.
I will spend an eternity loving you, caring for you, respecting you, showing you every day that I hold you as high as the stars.
However, you forgot our anniversary date , but it does not matter because I know that you may have forgotten the date but you haven't forgotten my value in your life.
